entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione suggests a diversion to sneak into Snape's office.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the teacher whose office Hermione wants to sneak into.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students who will help with the diversion.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another student who will help with the diversion.

relationships.description: Hermione suggests sneaking into Snape's office as a diversion.
Harry is involved in the diversion to sneak into Snape's office.
Ron is also involved in the diversion to sneak into Snape's office.
Hermione asks Harry for help with the diversion.
Hermione also asks Ron for help with the diversion.
